text: The Lost Patrol is a 1934 American World War I movie directed by John Ford and is the second adaption of the 1927 novel Patrol by Philip MacDonald. It stars Victor McLaglen, Boris Karloff, Wallace Ford, Reginald Denny, Alan Hale Sr., Billy Bevan, Brandon Hurst and was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1935. ==Other websites== * * Category:1934 movies Category:1930s war movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies based on books Category:World War I movies Category:Movies directed by John Ford
title: The Lost Patrol (1934 movie)
